Card: NO padding prop. Use <Card.Body>, <Card.Header>, <Card.Footer> sub-components. Use noPadding={true} to remove Card.Body default padding.
Do NOT wrap DataTable in a Card — tables should be bare (Docusign convention).
Button: Prefer size="small" or "medium" for standard UI. large/xlarge exist but are rare in Docusign patterns.
For icon-only buttons, use IconButton instead.
ComboButton: variant="tertiary" is ALWAYS icon-only — children text is ignored.
DataTable: Data-driven: NO children. Pass columns={DataTableColumn[]} and data={T[]}.
Column cell rendering: use cell(value, row) function in column definition.
For row actions: use renderRowActions={(row) => <Inline>...</Inline>} prop.
GlobalNav: Config-driven: pass as props object to DocuSignShell.globalNav slot, NOT as JSX children.
Standard items: Home, Agreements, Templates, Reports, Admin. Do NOT reduce to fewer items.
ALWAYS include: logo, navItems (5 items), showSearch, showNotifications, showSettings, and user.
Set active: true on ONE nav item to indicate the current page.
LocalNav: Config-driven: pass as props object to DocuSignShell.localNav slot, NOT as JSX children.
Use headerLabel + headerMenuItems for the 'Start' button dropdown.
Include 4-5 realistic section items. Do NOT reduce to fewer than 3 items.
DocuSignShell: GlobalNav and LocalNav go in slot props: globalNav={{...}} localNav={{...}}.
Children render as the main content area.
AgreementTableView: Use slot props: pageHeader={...}, filterBar={...}, banner={...}.
Children render as the main content (usually DataTable).
FilterBar: Config-driven via slot props: search, quickActions, filters, viewSelector.
NOT composed from Inline+SearchInput — use the FilterBar component directly.
Input: Use type prop for variants (text, email, password, number, etc.).
Use error prop (string) for inline validation messages.
Modal: footer prop takes ReactNode — use Inline with Buttons for standard actions.
Do NOT nest Modals — use a single Modal with conditional content instead.
Tabs: Config-driven: pass items={[{ id, label, content }]} array.
Controlled mode: use activeTab + onChange props together.
Badge: Use kind prop (not variant) to control color: success, warning, error, neutral, info.
Badge is NOT clickable — use Button or Link for interactive elements.
Select: Config-driven: pass options={[{ value, label }]} array.
onChange returns the value string directly, NOT a synthetic event.
Checkbox: onChange receives a boolean value, NOT an event object.
No CheckboxGroup component exists — compose with Stack + multiple Checkbox.
Switch: Use Switch (not Toggle — Toggle does not exist in the registry).
onChange receives a boolean value, NOT an event object.
Use Switch for instant-effect settings; use Checkbox for form submissions.
Drawer: title prop is required for accessibility.
Dropdown: Config-driven: pass items={[{ id, label, onClick }]} array.
trigger prop specifies the element that opens the dropdown.
Pagination: Controlled component: requires page + onPageChange props.
Breadcrumb: Config-driven: pass items={[{ label, href }]} array.
Already renders semantic <nav> — do NOT wrap in another <nav>.
